importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The series begins in the 1930s, marking the start of the Kennedy family's rise in American political and social life.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The narrative spans the 1930s to 1956, covering the formative years of the Kennedy family, including the rise of Joe Kennedy Sr. and the emergence of Jack Kennedy.

keyTakeAways: A new Netflix series titled 'Kennedy' is set to premiere, based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
Michael Fassbender stars as Joe Kennedy, Sr., portraying the patriarch of the Kennedy family in a drama exploring both their triumphs and tragedies.
The series begins in the 1930s and chronicles the ascent of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The show is described as a modern American mythology, blending historical narrative with human struggles, offering insight into both the Kennedys and broader American history.
The series is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story,' which focuses on JFK Jr.
The series will consist of eight episodes and has not yet been assigned a release date.

namedEntities.name: Kennedy family
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: An American political dynasty that produced several prominent public figures, including President John F. Kennedy, Senator Robert F. Kennedy, and JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The Kennedy family is central to the narrative, with the series exploring their rise, struggles, and legacy in American political and cultural history.

namedEntities.name: Michael Fassbender
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A renowned British actor known for roles in films such as 'The Theory of Everything' and 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi'.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is cast as Joe Kennedy Sr., the patriarch of the Kennedy family, bringing significant star power and credibility to the series.

namedEntities.name: Fredrik Logevall
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: An author and historian who wrote the biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His book serves as the source material for the series, providing historical depth and narrative foundation.

namedEntities.name: Netflix
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A global streaming platform known for original content and series development.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Netflix is the network producing and distributing the series, indicating its appeal to a broad international audience.

namedEntities.name: Sam Shaw
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The showrunner of the series, responsible for overseeing the creative direction and narrative development.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He provides the narrative vision and context, emphasizing the human and cultural significance of the Kennedy story.

namedEntities.name: John F. Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The 35th U.S. President, son of Joe Kennedy Sr., and a central figure in American political history.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His rise and fall are part of the Kennedy family’s legacy, explored in the series' portrayal of the family's political ambitions and tragedies.

namedEntities.name: JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The son of John F. Kennedy, who died in a plane crash in 1999 with his wife and sister-in-law.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His death is referenced as part of the Kennedy family's tragic history, reinforcing the 'curse' narrative in the series.

namedEntities.name: Ryan Murphy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A television producer known for 'American Horror Story' and other popular series.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His upcoming series 'American Love Story' is contrasted with the new Netflix show, highlighting a different narrative focus on JFK Jr.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956,' which will star Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr. The series begins in the 1930s and follows the rise of the Kennedy family, particularly the struggles of Jack Kennedy to escape the shadow of his older brother. It explores the family's triumphs and tragedies, including political achievements and fatal events such as JFK Jr.'s plane crash. The show is described as a modern American myth, blending historical facts with human emotion, and will consist of eight episodes with no release date yet confirmed. It is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming series on JFK Jr. and is being developed by showrunner Sam Shaw.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
